Title: 199: iOSDev vs AndroidDev.lazy().not()
Description:
A tweet from a famous tech journalist about Android vs iOS spurs a storm. In this episode, Donn and Kaushik given their honest thoughts on iOS vs Android; and being developers for the platform.

Shownotes

  • KG's post - iPhones, Pixels and lazy Android developers
  • Ben Thompson's tweet
  • Donn's post - The Three Buckets (The Rule of Thirds)
  • Garage Band - Apple iPhone app
  • Reeder 4 - iOS RSS Reader app
  • CultureCode's Things - iOS Todo app
